name: Mad Nords: Probably an Epic Quest
description: Mad Nords: Probably an Epic Quest is an old-school parody role-playing game. Explore a vast fantasy world, complete dozens of weird quests, fight dangerous foes and loot every chest that you'll stumble upon. Maybe you'll even get the opportunity to save the world. Who knows?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.4GHz processor or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics should be fine DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 512 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB NVidia or ATI Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 512 MB available space
